Member Function Documentation

ASPOSE_DLL_EXPORT pplx::task<HttpContent> com::aspose::api::TranslationApi::getTranslateDocument ( utility::string_t  name,
utility::string_t  srcLang,
utility::string_t  resLang,
boost::optional< utility::string_t >  storage,
boost::optional< utility::string_t >  folder 
)

Translate the HTML document specified by the name from default or specified storage. Allowed values for language pairs is en-de, en-fr, en-ru, de-en, ru-en, en-zh, zh-en.

Parameters:
name Document name.
srcLang Source language. Allowed values is "en" (alias "eng", "english"), "de" (alias "deu", "deutsch", "german"), "fr" (alias "fra", "french"), "ru" (alias "rus", "russian"), "zh", alias ("chinese").
resLang Result language. Allowed values is "en" (alias "eng", "english"), "de" (alias "deu", "deutsch", "german"), "fr" (alias "fra", "french"), "ru" (alias "rus", "russian"), "zh", alias ("chinese").
storage The source document storage. (optional)
folder The source document folder. (optional)

ASPOSE_DLL_EXPORT pplx::task<HttpContent> com::aspose::api::TranslationApi::getTranslateDocumentByUrl ( utility::string_t  sourceUrl,
utility::string_t  srcLang,
utility::string_t  resLang 
)

Translate the HTML document from Web specified by its URL. Allowed values for language pairs is en-de, en-fr, en-ru, de-en, ru-en, en-zh, zh-en.

Parameters:
sourceUrl Source document URL.
srcLang Source language. Allowed values is "en" (alias "eng", "english"), "de" (alias "deu", "deutsch", "german"), "fr" (alias "fra", "french"), "ru" (alias "rus", "russian"), "zh", alias ("chinese").
resLang Result language. Allowed values is "en" (alias "eng", "english"), "de" (alias "deu", "deutsch", "german"), "fr" (alias "fra", "french"), "ru" (alias "rus", "russian"), "zh", alias ("chinese").
